mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_post (postId, userId, title, content, image, cID) VALUES (#{postId}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{image}, #{cID})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_post ORDER BY regDate
SELECT postId, userId, title, content, image, regDate, cID FROM tbl_post WHERE userId=#{username} ORDER BY regDate
SELECT postId, userId, title, content, image, regDate, cID FROM tbl_post WHERE cID=#{cID} ORDER BY regDate
SELECT postId, userId, title, content, image, regDate, cID FROM tbl_post WHERE cID=#{cID} AND postId NOT IN (#{postId}) ORDER BY regDate
